text: Leonardo Latini (born 14 June 1974 in Terni) is an Italian politician and lawyer. He is a member of the right-wing populist party Lega Nord. Latini was elected Mayor of Terni on 24 June 2018 and took his office on 26 June. ==References== ==See also== *2018 Italian local elections *List of mayors of Terni ==External links== * * Category:1974 births Category:Living people Category:Mayors of Terni Category:Lega Nord politicians
title: Leonardo Latini
